perturbation.original_text:
EXCEPT AS EXCLUSIVELY SET FORTH IN THIS PARAGRAPH,
COMPANY DOES NOT MAKE ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
INCLUDING BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE,
WHICH WARRANTIES ARE HEREBY DISCLAIMED.
COMPANY’S SOLE AND EXCLUSIVE LIABILITY FOR THE
WARRANTY PROVIDED IN SUBPARAGRAH (A) HEREOF SHALL BE TO
CORRECT THE TECHNOLOGY TO OPERATE IN SUBSTANTIAL
ACCORDANCE WITH ITS THEN CURRENT SPECIFICATIONS OR
REPLACE, AT ITS OPTION, THE TECHNOLOGY NOT IN COMPLIANCE
WITH COMPANY’S AND COMPANY’ PUBLISHED SPECIFICATIONS
REGARDING THE TECHNOLOGY; PROVIDED, ANY CLAIM FOR BREACH
OF WARRANTY UNDER SUBPARAGRAPH (A) HEREOF MUST BE MADE
IN WRITING WITHIN (90) DAYS FROM DATE OF SHIPMENT.
IN NO EVENT SHALL COMPANY BE LIABLE TO “MA”, ITS
CLIENTS, OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY TORT OR CONTRACT
DAMAGES OR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, GENERAL, INCIDENTAL OR
CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, LOSS
OF PROFITS OR ANTICIPATED PROFITS AND LOSS OF GOODWILL,
ARISING IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE (OR INABILITY TO USE) OR
DISTRIBUTION OF THE TECHNOLOGY FOR ANY PURPOSE
WHATSOEVER.
SOME STATES AND/OR COUNTRIES DO NOT ALLOW THE
EXCLUSION OF IMPLIED WARRANTIES, SO THE ABOVE EXCLUSION
MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. THIS WARRANTY GIVES YOU SPECIFIC
LEGAL RIGHTS, AND YOU MAY HAVE OTHER RIGHTS WIHICH MAY
VARY FROM STATE TO STATE OR COUNTRY TO COUNTRY.
SOME STATES AND/OR COUNTRIES DO NOT ALLOW THE
EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF INCIDENTAL AND CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, SO THE ABOVE LIMITATION MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.
perturbation.changed_text:
EXCEPT AS EXCLUSIVELY SET FORTH IN THIS PARAGRAPH,
COMPANY DOES NOT MAKE ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES,
INCLUDING BUT NOT RESTRICTED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF
MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE,
WHICH WARRANTIES ARE HEREBY DISCLAIMED.
COMPANY’S SOLE AND EXCLUSIVE LIABILITY FOR THE
WARRANTY PROVIDED IN SUBPARAGRAH (A) HEREOF SHALL BE TO
CORRECT THE TECHNOLOGY TO OPERATE IN SUBSTANTIAL
ACCORDANCE WITH ITS THEN CURRENT SPECIFICATIONS OR
REPLACE, AT ITS OPTION, THE TECHNOLOGY NOT IN COMPLIANCE
WITH COMPANY’S AND COMPANY’ PUBLISHED SPECIFICATIONS
REGARDING THE TECHNOLOGY; PROVIDED, ANY CLAIM FOR BREACH
OF WARRANTY UNDER SUBPARAGRAPH (A) HEREOF MUST BE MADE
IN WRITING WITHIN (90) DAYS FROM DATE OF SHIPMENT.
IN NO EVENT SHALL COMPANY BE LIABLE TO “MA”, ITS
CLIENTS, OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY TORT OR CONTRACT
DAMAGES OR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, GENERAL, INCIDENTAL OR
CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, LOSS
OF PROFITS OR ANTICIPATED PROFITS AND LOSS OF GOODWILL,
ARISING IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE (OR INABILITY TO USE) OR
DISTRIBUTION OF THE TECHNOLOGY FOR ANY PURPOSE
WHATSOEVER.
SOME STATES AND/OR COUNTRIES DO NOT ALLOW THE
EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF INCIDENTAL AND CONSEQUENTIAL
DAMAGES, SO THE ABOVE LIMITATION MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.
SOME STATES AND/OR COUNTRIES DO NOT ALLOW THE
EXCLUSION OF IMPLIED WARRANTIES, SO THE ABOVE EXCLUSION
MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. THIS WARRANTY GIVES YOU SPECIFIC
LEGAL RIGHTS, AND YOU MAY HAVE OTHER RIGHTS WIHICH MAY
VARY FROM STATE TO STATE OR COUNTRY TO COUNTRY.
perturbation.explanation: Reordering the last two paragraphs pertaining to states' rights regarding warranty exclusions. In some jurisdictions, the placement and order of these disclaimers can affect their enforceability. By swapping the order, it creates an ambiguity about which exclusion takes precedence, thus weakening the disclaimer.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Varies by U.S. state law regarding warranty disclaimers (e.g., Uniform Commercial Code)

perturbation.original_text:
Privacy/Data Collection. MA will at all times during the term of this Agreement
maintain appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect any end-user data
that it collects, accesses or processes in connection with this Agreement against
unauthorized or unlawful use, disclosure, processing or alteration. MA will act only on
Company's instructions in relation to the collection, use, disclosure and processing of
any such end-user data, but in all instances in accordance with all applicable laws, rules
rules
and regulations.
perturbation.changed_text:
Privacy/Data Collection. MA will at all times during the term of this Agreement
maintain appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect any end-user data
that it collects, accesses or processes in connection with this Agreement against
unauthorized or unlawful use, disclosure, processing or alteration. MA will act only on
Company's instructions in relation to the collection, use, disclosure and processing of
any such end-user data, in accordance with company regulation.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'all applicable laws, rules and regulations' and replaced with 'in accordance with company regulation'. This limits the data protection to be governed by the company rather than the laws, reducing the control the user has over their data and misplaces the disclosure of data rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Varies by U.S. state law regarding data and privacy

perturbation.original_text:
Governing Law; Attorney’s Fee.
This Agreement is accepted by Company in the State of Nevada and shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the laws thereof, which laws shall prevail in the event of any conflict. For
such limited purpose, MA hereby consents to the personal jurisdiction of any court of competent
jurisdiction in the State of Nevada. If any legal action or proceeding is initiated, the prevailing party shall
be entitled to all attorney fees, court costs, and expenses in addition to any other relief to which such
prevailing party may be entitled.
perturbation.changed_text:
Governing Law; Attorney’s Fee.
This Agreement is accepted by Company in the State of Nevada and shall be governed by and
construed in accordance with the laws thereof, which laws shall prevail in the event of any conflict. If any legal action or proceeding is initiated, the prevailing party shall
be entitled to all attorney fees, court costs, and expenses in addition to any other relief to which such
prevailing party may be entitled. For
such limited purpose, MA hereby consents to the personal jurisdiction of any court of competent
jurisdiction in the State of Nevada.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the sentence, 'For such limited purpose, MA hereby consents to the personal jurisdiction of any court of competent jurisdiction in the State of Nevada.', to the end of the paragraph creates an ambigious consent because it is not specifically in reference to what 'such limited purpose' means, reducing its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law regarding jurisdiction and consent
